downfall.translation[0].definitions[0].d: complete loss of your money, moral standards, social position etc, or the sudden failure of an organization
downfall.translation[0].definitions[0].e: the scandal that led to the president’s downfall
downfall.translation[0].definitions[1].d: something that causes a complete failure or loss of someone’s money, moral standards, social position etc
downfall.translation[0].definitions[1].e: an addiction to gambling that proved to be her downfall
